info.title: API-Config - SelfCare Integration
info.description: Spring application exposes APIs for SelfCare

get.summary: Get creditor institutions associated to broker by station

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of elements on one page. Default = 50

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number. Page value starts from 0

parameters.name: broker-tax-code
parameters.description: Filter by broker tax code associated to creditor institutions

parameters.name: enabled
parameters.description: Filter by enabled station

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: This header identifies the call, if not passed it is self-generated. This ID is returned in the response.

get.summary: Get segregation codes grouped by creditor institutions associated to broker's station

parameters.name: broker-tax-code
parameters.description: Broker tax code

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: This header identifies the call, if not passed it is self-generated. This ID is returned in the response.

parameters.name: broker-tax-code
parameters.description: The broker's tax code.

parameters.name: stationId
parameters.description: The identifier of the station.

parameters.name: ciTaxCode
parameters.description: The creditor institution's tax code.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of elements to be included in the page.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The index of the page, starting from 0.

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: This header identifies the call, if not passed it is self-generated. This ID is returned in the response.

parameters.name: brokerId
parameters.description: The identifier of the PSP broker.

parameters.name: channelId
parameters.description: The identifier of the channel.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of elements to be included in the page.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The index of the page, starting from 0.

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: This header identifies the call, if not passed it is self-generated. This ID is returned in the response.

get.summary: Get the list of creditor institution business names
get.description: Return a list of business name and tax code of creditor institutions, given the provided list of creditor institution tax codes

parameters.name: taxCodeList
parameters.description: List of Creditor Institution's tax code

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: This header identifies the call, if not passed it is self-generated. This ID is returned in the response.

get.summary: Get the list of creditor institutions that can be associated to a station

parameters.name: station-code
parameters.description: Station's code

parameters.name: ciTaxCodeList
parameters.description: List of Creditor Institution's tax code, restrict the research to this tax code list only

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: This header identifies the call, if not passed it is self-generated. This ID is returned in the response.

get.summary: Get segregation code associations with creditor institution

parameters.name: ci-tax-code
parameters.description: Creditor institution's tax code that own the station

parameters.name: targetCITaxCode
parameters.description: Tax code of the creditor institution that will be associated to the station

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: This header identifies the call, if not passed it is self-generated. This ID is returned in the response.

get.summary: Get application code associations with creditor institution

parameters.name: creditorInstitutionCode
parameters.description: Organization fiscal code, the fiscal code of the Organization.

parameters.name: showUsedCodes
parameters.description: The flag that permits to show the codes already used. Default: true

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: This header identifies the call, if not passed it is self-generated. This ID is returned in the response.

parameters.name: creditorInstitutionCode
parameters.description: Organization fiscal code, the fiscal code of the Organization.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of elements to be included in the page.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The index of the page, starting from 0.

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: This header identifies the call, if not passed it is self-generated. This ID is returned in the response.

post.summary: Get the paginated list of all IBANs, filtering by creditor institution

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of elements to be included in the page.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The index of the page, starting from 0.

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: This header identifies the call, if not passed it is self-generated. This ID is returned in the response.

parameters.name: creditorinstitutioncode
parameters.description: The fiscal code of the Organization.

parameters.name: label
parameters.description: Filter by label

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: This header identifies the call, if not passed it is self-generated. This ID is returned in the response.

get.summary: Return OK if application is started

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: This header identifies the call, if not passed it is self-generated. This ID is returned in the response.

parameters.name: pspFiscalCode
parameters.description: The fiscal code of the PSP.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of elements to be included in the page.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The index of the page, starting from 0.

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: This header identifies the call, if not passed it is self-generated. This ID is returned in the response.

IbanDetails.description: List of IBANs associated to the passed creditor institutions

IbanLabel.description: The labels array associated with the iban

ibans.description: List of IBANs associated to the passed creditor institutions

limit.description: Required number of items per page

items_found.description: Number of items found. (The last page may have fewer elements than required)

total_items.description: Total number of items for all pages

title.description: A short, summary of the problem type. Written in english and readable for engineers (usually not suited for non technical stakeholders and not localized); example: Service Unavailable

status.description: The HTTP status code generated by the origin server for this occurrence of the problem.

detail.description: A human readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem.
detail.example: There was an error processing the request

ChannelDetails.description: List of stations associated to the same entity

channels.description: List of stations associated to the same entity

ci_owner.description: Fiscal code of the Creditor Institution who owns the iban

description.description: The description the Creditor Institution gives to the iban about its usage

is_active.description: True if the iban is active

validity_date.description: The date the Creditor Institution wants the iban to be used for its payments

publication_date.description: The date on which the iban has been inserted in the system

due_date.description: The date on which the iban will expire

labels.description: The labels array associated with the iban

IbanEnhanced.description: List of IBANs associated to the passed creditor institutions

ibans_enhanced.description: List of IBANs associated to the passed creditor institutions

business_name.description: The business name of the creditor institution

ci_tax_code.description: The tax code of the creditor institution

broker_code.description: Code used to identify the intermediate EC

broker_details.description: Name and generic details of the intermediate EC

enabled.description: Parameter to find out whether or not the intermediate has been enabled

extended_fault_bean.description: Parameter to find out whether or not the extended fault bean has been enabled

BrokerDetails.description: Details of the intermediate EC of the station

station_code.description: Unique code to identify the station

enabled.description: Parameter to find out whether or not the station has been enabled

broker_description.description: A description of the intermediate EC

redirect_ip.description: Redirect ip address of the station

redirect_port.description: Redirect port address of the station

redirect_query_string.description: Redirect query string of the station

redirect_protocol.description: Redirect protocol associated to the station

ip_4mod.description: Ip address 4mod associated to the station

port_4mod.description: Port address 4mod associated to the station

proxy_enabled.description: Parameter to inspect if the proxy has been enabled for this station

invio_rt_istantaneo.description: Parameter useful to find out if the instantaneous rt has been enabled

target_port.description: Port address target associated to the station

target_host_pof.description: Pof address associated to the station

target_port_pof.description: Port address pof associated to the station

target_path_pof.description: Pof path associated to the station

StationDetails.description: List of stations associated to the same entity

stations.description: List of stations associated to the same entity

code.description: The code that bound uniquely a creditor institution to a station

name.description: The name of the station associated to the creditor institution, if exists

CIAssociatedCode.description: List of codes not used for existing associations

used.description: List of codes already used for existing associations

unused.description: List of codes not used for existing associations

availableCodes.description: List of codes not used for existing associations

items.description: List of codes not used for existing associations

business_name.description: The business name of the creditor institution

creditor_institution_code.description: The fiscal code of the creditor institution

cbill_code.description: The CBill code of the creditor institution

broker_business_name.description: The business name of the broker associated to creditor institution by defined station

broker_code.description: The fiscal code of the broker associated to creditor institution by defined station

station_code.description: The code of the station that permits to associate a creditor institution to a broker

station_enabled.description: The flag that define if the station is enabled or not

station_version.description: The version of the station. It can be either 1 or 2

aux_digit.description: The value of the AUX digit field that can be set in payments' IUV

segregation_code.description: The value of the segregation code that can be set in payments' IUV in order to use this station

application_code.description: The value of the application code that can be set in payments' IUV in order to use this station

broadcast.description: The flag that define if the station is made for broadcast operations

ci_status.description: True if the CI is enabled

is_payment_options_enabled.description: True if the REST endpoint can be used for Payment Options service

aca.description: Flag tha define if ACA archive will be populated

stand_in.description: Flag that define if the debt positions can be paid in Stan In

CreditorInstitutionDetail.description: List of creditor institutions associated to the same broker by different stations

creditor_institutions.description: List of creditor institutions associated to the same broker by different stations

ci_tax_code.description: The tax code of the creditor institution

segregation_code_list.description: List of segregation code used by the creditor institution in a broker station

items.description: List of segregation code used by the creditor institution in a broker station

ApiKey.description: The API key to access this function app.
ApiKey.name: Ocp-Apim-Subscription-Key

Authorization.description: JWT token get after Azure Login
